Please use live chat or call us on %1s to get access. Show Recent transfers Search No results No country found Hey! I\'ve started using the UAE\'s newest banking app – YAP. Transform how you manage your money and join me in the banking revolution.\n\nDownload YAP here:\n\n%1$s % %1s
The Personalized Banking App I want an account for Personal Business Sign in Already have an account?
Real-time banking Real-time perks Real-time benefits Current account with no\nhidden fees A free Mastercard delivered to your doorstep Built-in analytics at your\nfingertips Real-time analytics Real-time management Real-time visibility Built-in budgeting at your\nfingertips Simplified expense and\npayroll processes Full overview of business\nspending Get started
Sign in to your account Email address or phone number Sign in New to YAP? Sign up now Enter the OTP sent to your registered mobile number to complete login That doesn\'t look right. Please try again Remember ID
What\'s your mobile number? You\’ve entered an invalid phone number. Please, try again. Next
Verify your mobile number We\'ve sent a verification code to\n %1$s Resend OTP Next
Create a 4- to 6- digit passcode to access your account Create passcode Create a new 4- to 6-digit passcode By creating a passcode you agree to our Terms & Conditions Set passcode Passcode cannot be a straight sequence Passcode cannot be of same digits
What\'s your name? First name Last name
What\'s your preferred email address? Let\'s get started Enter your business email to begin Email address
Great! you should now receive an email on We’ve sent you this so we can remain connected and give you important updates about your account. We\'ve just sent a verification email to Please check your email to confirm that we got it right.
Congrats, %1s! A YAP Personal Account has been created for you in less than %1s seconds! A YAP Personal Account has been created for you! Here\'s your IBAN Make sure you have your Emirates ID at hand before we proceed Complete verification
Due to all the excitement of our official launch, we are gradually activating as many accounts as possible to keep the app running smoothly. In the meantime, until your account is ready to be fully activated you’ll be placed in a queue.
Queue up!
Use Touch ID to log in to your account? Would you like to receive notifications from us? We use push notifications to give you updates about all transactions and to send important reminders about your account By clicking Use Touch ID you agree to our Terms & Conditions Use Touch ID No, thanks No, I’m fine Yes, keep me updated Use Touch ID to log into YAP quicker. Make sure your Touch ID is always on in your device settings
Enter your passcode to access this account Enter your passcode to continue Sign in Verify Forgot passcode? Forgot Pin
New OTP has been generated successfully
Complete verification %1s, please scan your Emirates ID Skip and go to dashboard Tap to scan your Emirates ID
Your card is on it\'s way! Make sure you have your original Emirates ID on you at the time of delivery as we’ll need to scan it Emirates ID Go to dashboard You will receive a message from our designated delivery company to confirm the date and time of delivery. Please make sure you have your Emirates ID on you at the time of delivery. Congrats, you\'re a YAP founder member!
Looks like you\'re from the %1$s
Sorry, we\'re unable to activate your YAP account at this time. We\'re working on it and we will let you know once resolved. Looks like you\'re under 21! We\'re sorry :( Unfortunately, we\'re unable to proceed with creating your account at this time. However, we appreciate your interest in getting a YAP account. Looks like you\'re from the United States We\'re sorry, we aren\'t able to create bank accounts for US Citizens at this point. Stay tuned though, we\'ll announce it everywhere if this changes! And while that\'s great, this YAP account is only for adults. Don\'t worry though, you can speak to your parents about getting you started with YAP Young or wait till you\'re 18 :) YAP works best with a valid Emirates ID Once you\'ve renewed or received your Emirates ID, re-scan it via our dashboard to continue opening your account with YAP. Go to dashboard Log out
Your card is ready to be delivered! Choose your location below. We will also call you to verify this address Tap map to confirm location Tap here to change location Address Enter your address Flat number/ Building name/ Landmark Enter landmark Confirm location Location has been added successfully I accept the CRS and FATCA Terms and Conditions Your card is ready to be delivered! Where can we deliver your debit card? We’ll need you to enter your address below
Almost there! Thanks %1$s! Verify your details so we can send you your YAP card Emirates ID Pending confirmation Name Nationality Date of birth Gender Male Female
Expiry date Confirm Re-scan Emirates ID Hey there, looks like you\'re under 21 No, I\'m over 21 Looks like your Emirates ID is expired No, I have a valid Emirates ID Looks like you\'re from %1s No, I\'m not from %1s Looks like your ID has expired. Please re-scan a valid ID Scan Emirates ID
First name Middle name (if applicable) Last name
Thanks %1$s! Verify your details are exactly as per your Emirates Id. You can edit the name fields incase we got it wrong!
Step 1 of 2 Step 2 of 2 Scan the front of your Emirates ID Now scan the back Scan A glare is detected on your document please try moving your document for best results Rescan Next Done Please review your scanned document and make sure it is readable Document you scanned does not appear to be front side of Emirates ID. Please rescan Document you scanned does not appear to be back side of Emirates ID. Please rescan Your scanned document is not properly readable. Please focus and try again. There is an error saving the image. Please try again There is an error in saving cropped image. Please try again Capturing Complete
Now create a unique PIN to start using this card This 4-digit code is yours to keep. Please don’t share it with anyone Create PIN I’ll do it later

Set limits ATM withdrawal Allow your card to withdraw from cash machines Online transactions Allow your card to be used for purchases made over the internet Payments abroad Allow your card to be used for payments outside your current country Retail payments Allow your card to be used at retail outlets. This includes restaurants, petrol stations and hospitality venues
Report lost or stolen card Transaction completed!\nYou now have a physical spare card Click \'block and report\' to confirm that your card has been lost, damaged or stolen. We will immediately block your card and report it to our security team. If you suspect any malicious activity or need to provide us with any other essential information regarding your card\'s disappearance, please give our customer care center a call at %1s Block and report Tell us what happened to your card Damaged card Lost/Stolen card Block card permanently We will now block your card permanently, following which you will be able to order a new card. Please confirm if you want to move forward with this action. Confirm Cancel

Household Manage your household salaries digitally Paying your household help is now easier than ever Struggling to keep up with managing your day-to-day house expenses? With Household, set up a quick and safe payments to your home staff so you can pay them on time and manage expenses easily. Set up monthly salaries, keep track of household spends, and enjoy the perks of a cashless life! Get a Household card
Let your help choose from any one of these breathtaking colors Give them the power to manage their salary and expenses Set up automatic payouts for salary payments and make life easier with cashless domestic expenses
Get a Household card Household card Simplify your household expenses and get your help a card with just their mobile number and email Select a plan: Monthly Yearly per month per year 12 months save %1s You will be charged after you have registered your Household staff. Please ensure you have enough funds in your account for your payment(s).
Get started
Choose from different card colors Set up automatic salary payments Create pots to track expenses in-app
Send salaries directly to account Allocate household budgets Set up automatic payments Track expenses through analytics
Get a Household card Who are you getting the Household plan for? First name Last name Name Last name Email address example@email.com Next
Tell us how to contact %1s Mobile number Confirm mobile number Add
Payment confirmed and %1s has been added to your account! %1s\'s card is on it\'s way Household card %1s will receive an SMS with instructions to download the app and complete sign up Let %1s know by sharing the details below: Email address Mobile number Temporary passcode Share Go to Household

Welcome %1s Great, let’s set up your plan To confirm this is really you, enter %1s\'s number below Enter %1s\'s number below Confirm Oops! Looks like that\'s the wrong number. Please try again You got it right! Now, create a new 4- to 6-digit passcode to use YAP
Well done, %1s! You’ve successfully registered yourself to the Household plan Complete setup Your card is on its way! We will call you to confirm the time. Make sure to keep your Emirates ID with you Your card will be delivered to:
Get direction Location Permission Yap determines your current location. Your location may be shown on map and is used to provide things such direction and in order to serve personalize alert. This allows for a better overall app experience.
Select a card color Household card Confirm location That’s right! \n Now select a card color

Your achievements
Refer a friend Tell your friends about us! Sharing is sweet, and it’s even better when you do it with friends. Send this special link to your special people so they change the way they bank too! Share your referral link Share Hey! I just joined the UAE\'s newest banking app – YAP. Transform the way you bank and reserve your place in the queue to be one of the first to join me in the banking revolution.\n\n%1s
We thought you should know, %1s! Some app features have been temporarily blocked for your security. This is because you made too many incorrect OTP attempts.\n\nGet in touch by calling our agents at %1s or message us via the Live Chat so we can unblock your account right away! This feature has been blocked due to too many OTP attempts. Use our live chat or call us on %1s to get access. Account activation pending
Where were you born? Just a few more details about you, as per \nyour passport. Select country City of birth Are you a dual national? Nationality as per EID Add second country
Tax Information Please let us know if you have any tax commitments Select country of tax residence Do you have a Tax Identification Number (TIN)? Select the reason for not having a TIN Reason for not having a TIN The country does not issue a TIN Add another country I am not a US national/resident for tax purposes. By clicking submit below, you are accepting the Individual Self Certification Form for CRS & FATCA. Enter your TIN number
Well done! You’re #%1s on our waiting list We’re currently in beta and only open to a limited number of users. Don’t worry, you’ll be the first to know when we’re ready. Should you wish to find out more in the meantime, our website has more information for you. Bump me up the queue Awesome! We\’re as excited as you are. We\’ll send you an SMS as soon as we\’ve launched! CLOSE You’re Your place in the queue waiting behind you We will notify you when you\’ve reached the top. Log back in to see your updated place in the queue. Want to jump the queue? Boost yourself up the queue by %1s for every friend you refer that signs up.🚀 Log back in to see your rank in the queue. #%1s Congrats! You were bumped up by %1s spots! Keep on referring to get to the top faster! You referred 0 friends! 😏 You referred %1s friends! 👏 You have been bumped up by %1s spots. Once your referred friends sign up, you will see their names listed below and your place in the queue bumped up by %1s spots for each friend! Signed up friends: %1s
Some of your card\'s feature may not work at this time. This is because your card or account may have been blocked temporarily.\n\nGet in touch by calling our agents at %1s or message us via the Live Chat so we can unblock your account right away! Some of your card\'s features are temporarily disabled. Get in touch with us at %1s for assistance.

Your available balance is: Scanned QR code belongs to your own YAP account. Please scan another QR code.
My profile
Top menu Get quick access to useful links related to your profile, account details, analytics, support and contacting YAP Your current balance This is an indicator of your available balance. It is always updated in real time and supported by a daily transaction graph. YAP it Launch the YAP it button to carry out important functions like sending money, adding funds to your account and paying bills. Search Finish Click here to search for specific transactions in your account history Daily transaction graph View your transactions plotted on a graph and drag your fingers along the bars to view a specific date. Purchased packages View and manage all your purchased YAP packages and add-ons in a single place. More icon Click here to add a name to your card, view statements or remove it from your account. Freeze card You can temporarily block usage of your card by clicking on Freeze. Don’t worry though, you can always unfreeze your card instantly. Set limits Customize your card’s usage by setting limits on where and how it can be used. OK, got it! You’re all set! Some features may appear blocked for you as you made too many incorrect OTP attempts. Call or chat with us now to get full access. Complete verification to activate your account. This 4-digit code is yours to keep. Please don\'t share it with anyone Renew ID Your Emirates ID has expired. Please update your account with the renewed ID as soon as you can. Get started Open your YAP account Set your PIN Add money to your account Set a profile picture Locked
Up and running Use YAP locally Freeze and unfreeze your card Spend AED 100 Explore card controls
Better Together Invite a friend Make a Y2Y transfer Split bills with YAP Send money outside YAP
Take the leap Order a virtual card Upgrade to Prime Go Metal Set up a multi-currency account
YAP Store Get YAP Young Sign up to Household Set missions on YAP Young Pay your help using Household
You\'re a Pro! Invite 10 friends to YAP Spend AED 1000 Complete a renewal
That first step was easy! Welcome to YAP. We\'re so happy you\'re here :) You’ve completed this task! \nTime for a little celebration 🥳 What are you waiting for? Go ahead and set a unique 4-digit PIN to start using your card Add money now Go on and add some money to your account so you can start spending! You can do this by using your existing bank card, make a wire transfer to this account or deposit cash at the nearest machine. Personalize your profile with a picture of you (or your pet) Set it now
Make heads turn the next time you’re out using your YAP card. Go out and buy yourself something nice using your YAP card. We won’t tell anyone 😉 Try to freeze and unfreeze your card. You’ll know what to do if you misplace it or if your card has been stolen Try freezing now Make your next AED 100 purchase a YAP one. Don’t forget to buy yourself something nice! You have full control of your card! \n\nSet limits against spending online, abroad, retail and at an ATM
Once you\'re set, head over to the top right menu on your dashboard (or via More on the bottom navigation menu) to start inviting your friends to join YAP.\n\n The more the merrier! Invite a friend Feeling generous? Send money to someone who isn\'t on your YAP contacts by adding them as a beneficiary in a few simple steps.\n\n Use the YAP It button and choose either bank transfer or cash pickup, so you can send money to even those who don\'t have a bank account! Send money to someone instantly within your YAP network. Tap on the YAP It button on your dashboard, select a friend from the list and enter the desired amount.\n\n Yes, It\'s that simple! Split bills (not friendships) the next time you go out with your friends.\n\nTo split a bill, simply swipe left on the transaction you want to split, send out reminders to your friends and settle up effortlessly.\n\n Psst… you can also send reminders!
Virtual cards let you make online payments without sharing your main card details.\n \n You can order a virtual card through the Cards section. It is available immediately, so the next time you need to enter your card details online but aren\'t comfortable doing it, just use your virtual card! A shiny new card available in 4 metallic shades and a world of perks! \n \nChoose from audacious amber, sparkly sterling, romantic rose or glorious granite. Upgrade now The ultimate YAP card – a 100% metal card with exclusive benefits. \n \nThe Metal card – or experience – is available in Black, Rose Gold and Chrome. Traveling abroad? Set up multi-currency on YAP (available on Prime and Metal plans), create currency wallets for the countries you’re visiting, and spend locally when you get there! \nYou can forget about exchanging cash or running out mid-holiday :) Set up
%1s, you reached the top of the Queue! You are now ready to fully activate and begin using your YAP account. Make sure you have your Emirates ID at hand before we proceed.
